entry.name: focus
entry.title: .focus()
entry.desc: Asynchronously set focus to an element.

argument.name: delay
argument.desc: The number of milliseconds to wait before setting focus.

argument.name: callback
argument.desc: A function to invoke after the element has been focused.

longdesc.p: This method is deprecated. Use .focus() without arguments inside a timeout or $.Widget's ._delay() method.
